title: Secrets In The Stacks - Snap Classic
description:
When Avi Steinberg became a prison librarian, he thought his job would be to keep track of the books.  Then he started reading between the lines.

Producer: Joe Rosenberg
itunes:title: Secrets In The Stacks - Snap Classic
itunes:subtitle: When Avi Steinberg became a prison librarian, he thought his job would be to keep track of the books.  Then he started reading between the lines. To learn more about Avi’s time behind bars -- and between the stacks -- be sure to check out his memoir, Run
author: paloma.orozco@prx.org (Snap Judgment and PRX)
